title: Game-Based Mobile Mathematics Education: Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, statistics, functions, etc.)
context.additional_context: Gamified mobile learning environment for acquiring advanced mathematics concepts needed for social sector job applications, utilizing personal mobile devices.

learning_goals: Through game-based assignments, learners apply advanced mathematical concepts (probability, optimization, data interpretation) with ≥85% achievement within one week
Via gamified assessments on mobile platforms, learners explain mathematical problem-solving processes with ≥70% accuracy
During game-based competition/collaboration with peers, learners provide ≥3 examples of mathematical concept applications
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
